content.text: What does the term 'body language' mean?
Discuss some examples - eg facial expressions / hand gestures etc.
How important is body language in communication?
Compare the use of body language in different cultures.
Why do you think it is so prevalent?
Are there limits on what it can communicate?
Are you good at reading other people's body language?
Discuss the meaning behind each of these and introduce vocabulary where required :
- hands : on hips, over mouth, on forehead, open hands, closed fist
Have you ever given a presentation or spoken in front of an audience?
Were you aware of your body language?
Actions speak louder than words - is that true?
